header.title: Let It Go! ‘Free Your Mind Friday’ Is Here to Help!

title: Let It Go! ‘Free Your Mind Friday’ Is Here to Help!
content:
It’s Friday—either the end of a rough week (good), or the start of an even rougher weekend (not so much). <!--more--> Which do you choose?
Do you remain mentally mired in media muck, or do you cut the chain around your brain?
Excellent choice!
Let it go, and reap the reward of some quiet time to reconstitute yourself.
Call 888-874-4888 and share with likeminded folk the thoughts about major news events that you’ve been holding on to all week.
Yes, that’s why there’s “Free Your Mind Friday.”
